remarks.format: ## Remarks Weitere Informationen zu [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], finden Sie in der XML Paper Specification (XPS), die als Download im [ http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761 ](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).For more information about [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_xps](~/includes/tla2sharptla-xps-md.md)], see the XML Paper Specification (XPS) available for download at [http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=65761).
